data.title: Valor Christian High School
data.meta_description: Looking for a private high school where your teen can prepare for college in a Christ-centered community? Explore all Valor Christian High School has to offer your teen.

Times of worship at the cross, sharing testimonies around the campfire of what Jesus has done in our lives, fun games in the rancho at night. God was pursuing every heart in countless ways each day.

Read More about Team Valor Takes Over Ruby Ranch

Congratulations to Valor's Boys Lacrosse team for winning the 5A State Championship.

Read More about Boys Lacrosse Wins State Championship!

Congratulations to Valor's Girls Golf team for winning their third straight State Championship!

Congratulations to sophomore Caroline Daugherty for winning State in Individual Girls Tennis!

Read More about Caroline Daugherty Wins Valor's First-Ever Individual Title!

Congratulations to all DECA students who competed at Internationals. Valor had 6 out of 7 groups finish in the Top 10 in the world!

Read More about Valor DECA Students Competed Great At Internationals

Congratulations to all Latin students for earning honors after taking the National Latin Exam in March.
